headline: Is Carnival (CCL) Priced Attractive After Recent Share Price Volatility And Cruise Demand Updates
summary: If you are wondering whether Carnival Corporation & at US$31.77 is offering good value right now, it helps to step back and look at what the market is pricing in. The stock has been volatile recently, with a 6.5% decline over the last 7 days, a 5.3% gain over the past month, and returns of 2.7% year to date and 21.7% over the last year. The very large 3 year return and 29.8% 5 year return show how sentiment has shifted over different time frames. Recent news around Carnival Corporation & has...
